line.text: Those parts of thee that the world eye doth view
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Want nothing that the thought of hearts can mend
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: All tongues (the voice of souls) give thee that due
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Uttering bare truth even so as foes commend
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Thy outward thus with outward praise is crowned
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But those same tongues that give thee so thine own
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: In other accents do this praise confound
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: By seeing farther than the eye hath shown
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: They look into the beauty of thy mind
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And that in guess they measure by thy deeds
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Then churls their thoughts (although their eyes were kind)
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: To thy fair flower add the rank smell of weeds
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But why thy odour matcheth not thy show
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: The soil is this that thou dost common grow
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
